items.sentence: I really couldn\'t have done this without you.
Where have you been for the past three months?
Tom was getting ready to leave when I saw him.
Tom was having lunch with Mary on the veranda.
Tom was here for quite a while this afternoon.
Tom was home alone with Mary during the storm.
Tom was just trying to get a rise out of Mary.
I wanted to tell Tom that I wouldn\'t do that.
I was hoping Tom wouldn\'t ask me to help him.
I was hoping Tom wouldn\'t tell me to do that.
I still don\'t know where I\'m supposed to go.
Tom gave Mary a sip of water from his canteen.
Tom gets paid to sing and to entertain people.
Tom goes fishing every weekend like I used to.
Tom goes jogging every morning, rain or shine.
Tom goes to the gym two or three times a week.
Free time is at a premium for working parents.
It\'s been a while since I\'ve studied French.
Tom is waiting to see how things will develop.
Have you noticed anything suspicious recently?
